price: នៅក្នុងឋានសួគ៌នោះ មានផ្លែឈើគ្រប់ប្រភេទសម្រាប់ ពួកគេ ហើយពួកគេទទួលបាននូវអ្វីៗដែលពួកគេសុំ។
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
